tool_description: Analyzes Fresnel zone clearance along RF propagation paths to determine signal obstruction and multipath effects impacting link quality.

terrain_resolution_m.description: Terrain sampling resolution in meters (10 to 100)

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude and longitude values out of valid range.
Invalid frequency: Frequency must be between 30 and 30000 MHz.
Invalid resolution: Terrain resolution must be between 10 and 100 meters.
Path too short: Minimum path length required for meaningful Fresnel analysis.
Terrain data missing: Cannot analyze clearance without elevation profile.
Frequency too low: Below minimum frequency for accurate Fresnel calculations.
usage: Specify TX/RX coordinates and frequency to analyze Fresnel zone clearance. The tool calculates obstruction percentages and multipath potential along the propagation path.

first_fresnel_radius_m.description: First Fresnel zone radius at path midpoint in meters

clearance_percentage.description: Percentage of first Fresnel zone that is clear

obstruction_points.description: Distances from TX where significant obstructions occur

multipath_risk.description: Assessment of multipath risk: low, medium, high

recommended_height_increase.description: Additional antenna height needed for 60% clearance in meters
